name: Keyboard War
description:
Take control the keyboard with you turrets, but it's really that easy as it look?

Instruction
  1. When turrets are created, use your mouse dragging the tower to the destination. You can only place in the key which has letter on it.
  2. Or you can use keyboard to deploy the turrents by pressing the key screen is showing.
  3. Turrets can be stacked, higher turrets will get better shooting range.
  4. Turrets have line of sight, when it's been blocked, it will not shoot any bullet.
  5. Your target is to attack the right command key (back slash, enter and right shift), when those three are down, you win the game.
  6. Be aware of the Chain Reaction, when an enemy or turret EXPLOSION, it will generate heat for nearby 3x3x3 area (diagonal position is not included). It may become OUT OF CONTROL and took down all turrents you built.
  7. Have fun with this game ; )
Details

Meet Tower, a turret that can attack enemy.

Every shoots will generate heat inside Tower, it needs external cooling devices to prevent EXPLOSION! 

 When Tower is getting hot, it will slower turn red to indicate the heat status. 

 When Tower turns yellow, means it will soon EXPLOSION!

Meet Cooler, a turret that can cool nearby turrets.

Every seconds Cooler will cool nearby 3x3x3 turrets. Diagonal position is not included.

Cooler has the same indicator for heat status. Red for hot, yellow for EXPLOSION soooooon.

Open Source

This game is open source, please visit Github Page for more detail.

This game use external CC-0 SFX Resources and DOTween Library for development, Thanks to those awesome projects.
